comment_body: Ah shit! I told joe to be quiet !!
If you like this you should read the Remembrance of Earth's Past trilogy by Liu Cixin.
This actually got a good chuckle out of me. Oh the irony was rich. Lovely short!
It's cute that you think earth will still exist in 2099
Cmon Joe, could you just shut up?
Thank you for sharing! I love the theme and am glad to know another source of it.

Thanks!

Just watch out for the next shooting star you see.
